law.catch_line: The Board shall reinstate the license of a licensed environmental health specialist who has failed t...
law.text:
The Board shall reinstate the license of a licensed environmental health specialist who has failed to renew the license for any reason if the licensed environmental health specialist:
Pays the Board all lapsed renewal fees and demonstrates that training as required by the Board has been completed;
Reapplies and meets the qualifications and requirements for licensure; and
Pays to the Board a reinstatement fee set by the Board.
